title: Authorization Request
description: Schema for authorization requests in the Elhub authorization manager.

links.description: Link members related to the primary data.

data.description: The request's "primary data" is a representation of the resource or collection of resources targeted by a request.

oneOf.description: An array of resource objects, an array of resource identifier objects, or an empty array ([]), for requests that target resource collections.
null if the request is one that might correspond to a single resource, but doesn't currently.

linkUrl.description: A string containing the link's URL.

meta.description: Non-standard meta-information that can not be represented as an attribute or relationship.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the JSON document was created.

type.description: The type of the linked resource.

id.description: The unique identifier of the linked resource.

resource.description: The resource of this schema is an authorization request.

id.description: The unique identifier of the authorization request.

type.description: The type of the resource object.
The type of the authorization request.

status.description: The status of the authorization request.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the authorization request was created.

validTo.description: The date and time when the authorization request is valid to.

resourceMeta.description: Any additional meta-information related to the resource.

supplierContract.description: The unique identifier of a supplier contract associated with the authorization request.

topLevelLinks.description: The top-level links object **MAY** contain the following members: self, related, pagination links.

self.description: The link that generated the current JSON request.
